languages.text: Энфорсеры не могут помочь — культ скрытый и загадошный, но говорят, что иногда в туннелях можно встретить людей в красном, дарующих милосердную смерть сброду, чем помогают энфорсерам поддерживать оптимальную численность населения. Если Компаньонка еще не в ростере — упомянут, что она тусуется где-то неподалеку.
languages.translation_comment: поднимается этюд CaptainKnowsNothing, который проверяется в DTS_Bloodprints_Dialogue в Answer_0007

languages.text: "Совершенно верно. Блюстители... не препятствуют им в исполнении своих священных обязанностей". {n}Капитан недовольно хмурится.{/n} "Хоть это и непорядок, что члены экипажа имеют секретное логово, в которое не допущены блюстители, носят оружие и вершат кровавый суд".
languages.translation_comment: поднимается этюд CaptainKnowsNothing, который проверяется в DTS_Bloodprints_Dialogue в Answer_0007

traits.locale_text: "Нет, Лорд-капитан. Никто не знает — культисты хорошо прячутся и надежно хранят свои секреты".

languages.text: "That is correct. The enforcers... do not bar them from carrying out their sacred duties..." {n}He scowls.{/n} "As irregular as it is to have armed crew members set up a secret hideout forbidden to the enforcers, and that they can go around dispensing bloody justice."
languages.original_text: "Совершенно верно. Блюстители... не препятствуют им в исполнении своих священных обязанностей". {n}Капитан недовольно хмурится.{/n} "Хоть это и непорядок, что члены экипажа имеют секретное логово, в которое не допущены блюстители, носят оружие и вершат кровавый суд".

traits.locale_text: "That is correct. The enforcers... do not bar them from carrying out their sacred duties." {n}He scowls.{/n} "As irregular as it is that we can have armed crew members set up a secret hideout forbidden to the enforcers, and that they can go around dispensing bloody justice."

"The servants of death guard their secrets well, but even the most meatheaded of lower-deck lowlives knows they bring the grace of liberation. If a Bloodweaver has come to your door, let them in and kneel before them. For that is the Undying One reaching out a hand to you through a servant of His."

"That is correct. The enforcers... do not bar them from carrying out their sacred duties—" {n}He scowls.{/n} "As irregular as it is to have armed crew members set up a secret hideout forbidden to the enforcers, and that they can go around dispensing bloody justice."

"The servants of death guard their secrets well, but even the thickest lower-deck lowlife knows they bring the grace of liberation. If a Bloodweaver comes to your door, let them in and kneel before them. For that is the Undying One reaching out a hand to you through one of His servants."

"That is correct. The enforcers... do not bar them from carrying out their sacred duties..." {n}He scowls.{/n} "As irregular as it is to have armed crew members set up a secret hideout forbidden to the enforcers, and that they can go around dispensing bloody justice."

"That is correct. The enforcers... do not bar them from carrying out their sacred duties." {n}He scowls.{/n} "As irregular as it is that we can have armed crew members set up a secret hideout forbidden to the enforcers, and that they can go around dispensing bloody justice."

"That is correct. The enforcers... do not bar them from carrying out their sacred duties—" {n}He scowls.{/n} "As irregular as it is to have armed crew members set up a secret hideout forbidden to the enforcers, and that they can go around dispensing bloody justice."

"That is correct. The enforcers... do not bar them from carrying out their sacred duties—" {n}He scowls.{/n} "As irregular as it is to have armed crew members set up a secret hideout forbidden to the enforcers, and that they can go around dispensing bloody justice."

"That is correct. The enforcers... do not bar them from carrying out their sacred duties—" {n}He scowls.{/n} "As irregular as it is to have armed crew members set up a secret hideout forbidden to the enforcers, and that they can go around dispensing bloody justice."

"That is correct. The enforcers... do not bar them from carrying out their sacred duties..." {n}He scowls.{/n} "As irregular as it is to have armed crew members set up a secret hideout forbidden to the enforcers, and that they can go around dispensing bloody justice."

languages.text: «Es correcto. Los guardias... no les prohíben llevar a cabo sus sagrados deberes...». {n}Frunce el ceño.{/n} «Por irregular que resulte permitir a tripulantes armados establecer un escondite secreto donde los guardias tienen vetada la entrada, y que encima vayan por ahí ajusticiando al personal».
languages.original_text: "That is correct. The enforcers... do not bar them from carrying out their sacred duties..." {n}He scowls.{/n} "As irregular as it is to have armed crew members set up a secret hideout forbidden to the enforcers, and that they can go around dispensing bloody justice."

traits.locale_text: «Es correcto. Los guardias... no les prohíben llevar a cabo sus sagrados deberes...». {n}Frunce el ceño.{/n} «Por irregular que resulte permitir a tripulantes armados establecer un escondite secreto donde los guardias tienen vetada la entrada, y que encima vayan por ahí ajusticiando al personal».

«Los sirvientes de la muerte protegen bien sus secretos, pero incluso el más tonto de los gusanos de las cubiertas inferiores sabe que traen el don de la liberación. Si un tejedor llama a la puerta, lo correcto es dejar que pase y arrodillarse ante él, pues es el Inmortal quien extiende su mano a través de uno de Sus sirvientes».

languages.text: 「そのとおりであります。エンフォーサーは…神聖な任務の遂行を、禁じてはおりません…」{n}彼は眉をひそめた。{/n}「武装したクルーが、エンフォーサーが立ち入ることのできない秘密の隠れ家を作り、血塗られた正義を振りかざして回るのは、異常としか言いようがありません」
languages.original_text: "That is correct. The enforcers... do not bar them from carrying out their sacred duties—" {n}He scowls.{/n} "As irregular as it is to have armed crew members set up a secret hideout forbidden to the enforcers, and that they can go around dispensing bloody justice."

traits.locale_text: 「そのとおりであります。エンフォーサーは…神聖な任務の遂行を、禁じてはおりません…」{n}彼は眉をひそめた。{/n}「武装したクルーが、エンフォーサーが立ち入ることのできない秘密の隠れ家を作り、血塗られた正義を振りかざして回るのは、異常としか言いようがありません」
「デスガードの従者たちはその秘密を厳重に守っていますが、どこまでも厚顔無恥な下層デッキの下等な連中ですら、彼らが解放の恵みを与えてくれると知っています。ウィーヴァーがあなたの戸口に表れたなら、招き入れてその前にひざまずくのです。それは、不死の者がその従者の一人を通してあなたに手を差し伸べられたということなのだから」
「そのとおりであります。エンフォーサーは…神聖な任務の遂行を、禁じてはおりません…」{n}彼は眉をひそめた。{/n}「武装したクルーが、エンフォーサーが立ち入ることのできない秘密の隠れ家を作り、血塗られた正義を振りかざして回るのは、異常としか言いようがありません」

languages.text: “是这样的。执法者……不会干扰他们履行神圣的职责……”{n}他皱起了眉头。{/n}“一群武装人员，他们建立起了自己的秘密据点，禁止执法者进入，还到处执行血腥的‘正义’，这实在是太不正常了。”
languages.original_text: "That is correct. The enforcers... do not bar them from carrying out their sacred duties..." {n}He scowls.{/n} "As irregular as it is to have armed crew members set up a secret hideout forbidden to the enforcers, and that they can go around dispensing bloody justice."

traits.locale_text: “是这样的。执法者……不会干扰他们履行神圣的职责……”{n}他皱起了眉头。{/n}“一群武装人员，他们建立起了自己的秘密据点，禁止执法者进入，还到处执行血腥的‘正义’，这实在是太不正常了。”
“死亡的仆人守口如瓶，但即便是底层甲板最卑劣的家伙，也知道他们会带来解脱与死亡。如果某位织网者出现在你的门外，那你应该打开大门让他进来，在他面前跪下，因为这意味着不死之神通过祂的仆人向你伸出了手。”
“是这样的。执法者……不会干扰他们履行神圣的职责……”{n}他皱起了眉头。{/n}“一群武装人员，他们建立起了自己的秘密据点，禁止执法者进入，还到处执行血腥的‘正义’，这实在是太不正常了。”

languages.text: "Das ist korrekt. Die Enforcer ... verbieten ihnen nicht, ihre heiligen Pflichten zu erfüllen ..." {n}Sein Blick verfinstert sich.{/n} "Genauso unkorrekt wie von bewaffneten Mitgliedern der Crew ein geheimes Versteck einrichten zu lassen, zu dem Enforcer keinen Zugang haben, um für blutige Gerechtigkeit zu sorgen."
languages.original_text: "That is correct. The enforcers... do not bar them from carrying out their sacred duties..." {n}He scowls.{/n} "As irregular as it is to have armed crew members set up a secret hideout forbidden to the enforcers, and that they can go around dispensing bloody justice."

traits.locale_text: "Das ist korrekt. Die Enforcer ... verbieten ihnen nicht, ihre heiligen Pflichten zu erfüllen ..." {n}Sein Blick verfinstert sich.{/n} "Genauso unkorrekt wie von bewaffneten Mitgliedern der Crew ein geheimes Versteck einrichten zu lassen, zu dem Enforcer keinen Zugang haben, um für blutige Gerechtigkeit zu sorgen."

"Die Diener des Todes hüten ihre Geheimnisse gut, aber selbst der dümmste Taugenichts auf den unteren Decks weiß, dass sie die Gnade der Befreiung bringen. Wenn ein Weber an Eure Tür kommt, lasst Ihr ihn ein und fallt auf die Knie. Denn es bedeutet, dass der Todlose Euch durch einen Seiner Diener die Hand reicht."

"Das ist korrekt. Die Enforcer ... verbieten ihnen nicht, ihre heiligen Pflichten zu erfüllen ..." {n}Sein Blick verfinstert sich.{/n} "Genauso unkorrekt wie von bewaffneten Mitgliedern der Crew ein geheimes Versteck einrichten zu lassen, zu dem Enforcer keinen Zugang haben, um für blutige Gerechtigkeit zu sorgen."

languages.text: « Tout à fait. Les prévôts... ne font rien pour les empêcher de mener à bien leur mission sacrée. » {n}Il se renfrogne.{/n} « Même s'il est contraire au règlement de laisser des membres de l'équipage armés aménager un repaire secret interdit aux forces de l'ordre et exercer leur justice sanglante comme bon leur semble. »
languages.original_text: "That is correct. The enforcers... do not bar them from carrying out their sacred duties..." {n}He scowls.{/n} "As irregular as it is to have armed crew members set up a secret hideout forbidden to the enforcers, and that they can go around dispensing bloody justice."

traits.locale_text: « Tout à fait. Les prévôts... ne font rien pour les empêcher de mener à bien leur mission sacrée. » {n}Il se renfrogne.{/n} « Même s'il est contraire au règlement de laisser des membres de l'équipage armés aménager un repaire secret interdit aux forces de l'ordre et exercer leur justice sanglante comme bon leur semble. »

« Les serviteurs de la mort gardent bien leurs secrets, mais même les pires dégénérés des ponts inférieurs savent qu'ils accordent la bénédiction de la délivrance. Si un tisseur se présente à votre porte, laissez-le entrer et agenouillez-vous, car c'est signe que l'Immortel vous tend la main par l'intermédiaire de l'un de Ses serviteurs. »

languages.text: "Bu doğru. İnfazcılar... Kutsal vazifelerini gerçekleştirmelerine mâni olmaz." {n}Kaşlarını çatıyor.{/n} "Silahlı bir tayfanın infazcılara yasaklanan, gizli bir sığınak kurup etrafta adalet dağıtarak dolaşması kural dışı olsa da..."
languages.original_text: "That is correct. The enforcers... do not bar them from carrying out their sacred duties..." {n}He scowls.{/n} "As irregular as it is to have armed crew members set up a secret hideout forbidden to the enforcers, and that they can go around dispensing bloody justice."
